response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is valued at $800,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it from us at $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows for a substantial return on our investment while providing you with unparalleled value. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business and hope to hear from you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
